subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Steve Novak and the Knicks, the N.B.A.’s last undefeated team, have not allowed more than 40 points after halftime in any of their four victories.
snippet: Steve Novak and the Knicks, the N.B.A.’s last undefeated team, have not allowed more than 40 points after halftime in any of their four victories.
